pages.text: Color Palettes can ONLY be insert into a newly placed pedestal, Inserting it will permanently change the color of the pedestal, consuming the Palette in the process.

pages.title: Palettes (Inserting)
pages.text: When inserting palettes, they change the color of the pedestal. $(br) Inserting palettes can be done with palette in the Offhand, then Right Click the pedestal, this will remove one palette from your Offhand.
